page.title: 14THE GUIDES IN TIBSHELF
page.content: On a Monday every week I go to Guides with my friends, Joanne, Helen & Lisa. We pay weekly subs of 25p and then we do all sorts of things. I used to be in Bluetit patrol but I am now in Robins. As I heve only recently joined Guides, I haven't got many badges yet. I have got my Yellow Point Trefoil and I have passed my Hostess, Sportswoman and Homemaker badges. I am going to work for six more badges during the summer holiday. Most of our Guides are going to the big Jamboree in Chatsworth Park where we shall meet other Guides from all over England and from other countries as well. Some Guides from Gibraltar are coming to stay with the Guides in Tibshelf. I am going to look after two of them and I have had letters from them already. by Carol (11)
